summary: An ordinance levying a special assessment to redeem the annual installments and interest to mature and become payable upon the bonds of Local Improvement District No. 95 issued under authority of Ordinance No. 3723 for the improvement of Kenney Street, under Ordinance No. 3577 in accordance with the assessment roll of said district as approved by Ordinance No. 3678 providing for the collection thereof, and providing penalties for non-payment at maturity.
